data.claim: Design Tools Master List: Gradients (CSS Gradient, Mesher, MagicPattern), Colors (Coolors, Realtime Colors, WebAIM Contrast), Components (shadcn/ui, Radix UI, Headless UI), Icons (Lucide, Phosphor, Heroicons), Illustrations (unDraw, Blush, Storyset), Effects (ui.glass, neumorphism.io, Smooth Shadows), Design Systems (Material Design 3, Apple HIG, Carbon, Fluent).
